## #TidyTuesday
[TidyTuesday](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) is a weekly data project aimed at the R ecosystem. Although an emphasis is placed on understanding how to summarize and arrange data to make meaningful charts with ggplot2, tidyr, dplyr and other tools in the tidyverse ecosystem, any code-based methodology is welcome. Every week a raw dataset, a chart or article related to that dataset is posted, and people are invited to explore the data. The goal of TidyTuesday is to apply R skills, get feedback, explore otherâ€™s work, and connect with the greater #RStats community!
